The answers I’ve seen so far have being using floats or the text-align method. I’ll share with you a trick I’ve used in the past. We can also achieve the same effect using the margin method. “margin-left: 100%” pushes the text all the way to the right of the page and vice-versa for “margin-right: 100%”. Hope this helps!
